Scholarships

CMRIT SCHOLARSHIP - ACADEMIC YEAR 2022-23

CMRIT GENERAL SCHOLARSHIP 2022-23

Scholarship Title Particulars Percentage (tuition fee waiver) Amount Documents Required
CMR Students Scholarships Students who are joining from CMR Institution to CMR Institution i.e. from CMR PU / +2 to UG programmes and CMR UG to PG programmes.
This scholarship is apart from the Founder’s Day Scholarship. 		₹10,000 College ID Proof, Marks sheet or Transfer certificate
Social Service NCC – B certificate 10% NCC – B certificate
Defence Scholarships and Bravery Award Ward of Recipients of – Gallantry Paramvir Chakra, Ashok Chakra, Mahavir Chakra, Kirti Chakra, Veer Chakra and Shaurya Chakra 25% Proof of awards, dependent ID, address proof.
Killed in action 25% Death Certificate, ID Card, Address proof.
Disabled in action 25% Proof of disability, ID Card, Address Proof.
President police medals 20% Proof of award, ID Card, Address Proof
Working / Retired (Army, navy, Air Force, CRPF, BSF and Police) 10% ID card, Address proof.
For Siblings This fees concession is applicable for the students whose Brother or Sister is studying in the CMR University or CMRGOI ₹10,000 Id Card of the Existing Student, Address proof of the Siblings and Parents.
Single Parent Child of single parent (Mother only) scored 75% marks at qualifying examination are eligible. The annual income of the mother shall be less than 6 lacs per annum ₹25,000 Death certificate / Divorce Copy, Address proof, 12th Mark sheet Income Certificate is Mandatory
7 Sisters Students from North East – Arunachal Pradesh, Assam, Manipur, Meghalaya, Mizoram, Nagaland and Tripura are eligible for admission into any of CMRU & CMRIT. ₹10,000 12th Mark sheet, Address Proof.
Andaman & Nicobar Students from Andaman and Nicobar islands are eligible to get ₹10,000 12th Mark sheet, Address Proof.
J & K Students from J & K are eligible to get ₹10,000 12th Mark sheet, Address Proof.
Physically Challenged 70% handicapped 70% Proof of disability with percentage, 12th Mark sheet, Address Proof.
Between 25 to 69% handicapped 40%
Below 25% handicapped 10%
∙ The student is to produce a proper document of claim. ∙ The committee headed by the Hon’ble Vice chancellor and Pro vice Chancellors and Registrar as members in the committee examine the evidence and declare the concession.

CMRIT SPORTS SCHOLARSHIP 2022-23

Scholarship Title Particulars Percentage (tuition fee waiver) Amount Documents Required
UG and PG Students of CMRIT Sports Scholarships International Level Students in Individual Sports 80% Original Certificates National level / International Level / State Level
International Level Students in Team Sports 70%
National Level Students in Individual Sports 60%
National Level Students in Team Sports 50%
State Level Students in Individual Sports 40%
State Level Students in Team Sports 30%
∙ The above fee waivers for CET & COMEDK students are applicable ONLY to the first year, i.e., year of admission. ∙ These waivers will be continued for the subsequent years ONLY IF the student maintains a minimum of 80% marks. ∙ This sports scholarship is available for the first 10 students only.
